page.description: Properties and methods in the Fill Class.

property.name: Style
property.description:
Type: "C",
Fill style (i.e. Solid,Gradient styles,Hatch Styles)

property.name: Accent_Color
property.description:
Type: "C",
Fill Accent Color, Optional for Gradient and Hatch Styles.

methodref.name: FromString
methodref.description: Convert Fill text to an fill definition.

methodref.name: GenerateCssStyle
methodref.description: Generate the CSS style for the fill.

methodref.name: ToString
methodref.description: Output the Fill text that represents the fill definition.

methodref.name: Clone
methodref.description: Create a copy of an object instance.

methodref.name: NewInstance
methodref.description: Create a new object instance of the same type.
